title: august 11: the oldest shark in the world
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the day scientists declared they had discovered an almost 400-year-old shark. After, Maia explores the 1984 smash hit movie and song -- Ghostbusters. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
